title: IHE Interactive Multimedia Report (IMR)
introduction: Encoding and Presentation of an Interactive Multimedia Report

list.desc: Continuous Integration Build (latest in version control)

list.descmd:
Version 1.1.0
    - Quality improvements
    - Very small typo in DiagnosticReport specification by @kinsonho in https://github.com/IHE/RAD.IMR/issues/17
    - Typo in section reference to BIR by @kinsonho in https://github.com/IHE/RAD.IMR/issues/18
    - Reference to non-existing Note 2 by @kinsonho in https://github.com/IHE/RAD.IMR/issues/19
    - Request from HL7 FHIR-i: tighten the context for the Associated Study Extension by @kinsonho in https://github.com/IHE/RAD.IMR/issues/20
    - Remove note about WIA being Trial Implementation by @kinsonho in https://github.com/IHE/RAD.IMR/issues/22
    - Remove link to the BIR TI Supp by @kinsonho in https://github.com/IHE/RAD.IMR/issues/23
    - Remove RAD-145 in IMR Appendix B by @kinsonho in https://github.com/IHE/RAD.IMR/issues/24

list.desc: Trial Implementation: for experimental implementation and feedback.
Public Comment release for first IG authored version
Pre-Public Comment release for first IG authored version
